ygData.subject: RE: Lute of the Gypsy Princess and other lutes.
ygData.msgSnippet: ... What type of resist does starfire check against?  Magic resist significantly reduces the damage I take from clerical casters, and fire/cold resist does the
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 23 Nov 1999, Ryan Honeyman wrote:
>
> ... in a matter of seconds all that ran through my mind,
> Starfire casting time is 6.2 seconds I believe. I had
> approximately 12.4 seconds to figure out my plans. I
> think I made the best choice. I pulled a 'fearplane'.
> Get a loc, curl into a ball, and kiss your ass goodbye.

What type of resist does starfire check against? Magic resist
significantly reduces the damage I take from clerical casters,
and fire/cold resist does the same against wizard-type
casters. It's less effective against higher level mobs (wish
that were true when it's the player casting on a mob), but
on several occasions I've gone from "Oh crap, I'm going to
die - keep my resists up, maybe the others can get away" to
"Hey, I'm not taking that much damage, maybe my party can kill
it before it kills me."

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
